lexUnit.name: sentence.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: declare the punishment decided for (an offender).

sentence.text: A military court in Zagreb on May 20 sentenced five Croats to terms of between one and 3@1/2 years for preparing an armed insurrection against the JNA to kill officers and their families .
On Jan. 31 , 1990 , a martial law court in Diyarbakir sentenced Mehmet Ozun to death for murder and for membership of an " illegal organization " .
Today Swindon Magistrates sentenced her to 3 months ' imprisonment .
A court in Bootle sentenced Fields on July 11 to 60 days ' imprisonment for refusing to pay the community charge or " poll tax " .
Sentenced to death for the casual murder of two teenage boys in San Diego in 1978 , Harris had lodged numerous appeals , several of which had been considered by the Supreme Court .
He was sentenced to death in 1983 , although the sentence was commuted to a 20-year prison term in 1991 .
In 1961 , Nazi leader Adolf Eichmann was sentenced to death for war crimes .
His brother , Gene Gotti , had been sentenced to 50 years ' imprisonment on July 7 , 1989 , after being found guilty of running a multimillion-dollar drugs ring .
Doherty had been sentenced to life imprisonment in 1981 for the murder of a British army captain during an ambush in Northern Ireland .
His co-defendant , Frank " Frankie Locs " Locascio , was also sentenced to life imprisonment ; both men were also fined $250,000 .
Luther Custodio , and 15 others including a captain and a lieutenant , were sentenced to life imprisonment for the murder of Benigno Aquino and of his alleged assassin Rolando Galman .
Two men who smuggled half a million pounds worth of cannabis into Britain in a rubber dinghy have each been sentenced to four years in jail .
Generally men sentenced for rape get off very lightly .
Ayres , from Cardiff , was sentenced to 11 years for robbery in 1990 .
Moore was sentenced for her part in the 1982 bombing of the Droppin' Well pub at Ballykelly , Co Londonderry .
On February 11 this year , after a two-week trial , Iain was found guilty on all counts and sentenced to detention for life .
Werner Lotze , 38 , a Red Army Faction extremist , was sentenced on Jan. 31 by the Bavarian state court to 12 years ' imprisonment .

After a five-hour trial Bao was sentenced by the People 's Intermediate Court to five years ' imprisonment for " inciting " counter-revolutionary activities and to four years for " divulging state secrets " .
Defendants who are convicted in the Crown Court are sentenced by a Crown Court judge .
He was sentenced to death in absentia last December after being charged with ordering assassinations from abroad .
Two former students were sentenced in absentia to life imprisonment .
The ship 's captain , Adrian Hopkins , who was on trial in Dublin , was sentenced in absentia to seven years .
His co-defendant , Rudolf Ernst , who was resident in New York , was sentenced in his absence to two years ' imprisonment .
On April 15 an FIS leader , Mohammed Said , was sentenced in his absence to 10 years in prison .
He sentenced both to four years in a young offenders centre for hijacking and to six months for criminal damage .
Both men were also sentenced to two years ' imprisonment after admitting they had conspired to corruptly obtain a consideration from Mr Barrett .
